001package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004
005/**
006 *      Internal context of an ad instance.
007 *
008 *      Note:
009 *              Some methods and references to ICreativeRendition and ICreativeRenditionAsset
010 *              are *not* available for player right now.
011 */
012public interface IAdInstance {
013        /**
014         * Get the ad id.
015         *
016         * @return an int value represent ad id
017         */
018        public int getAdId();
019
020        /**
021         * Get IRendererController of the ad. Only for player use.
022         *
023         * @return IRendererController of the ad
024         */
025        public IRendererController getRendererController();
026
027        /**
028         * Retrieve the parameters from the ad instance.
029         *
030         * The parameter value will be retrieved from levels in the following order:
031         * override, creative rendition, creative, slot, profile, global.
032         * Only for player use.
033         *
034         * @param    name    parameter name
035         * @return the value of the parameter
036         */
037        public Object getParameter(String name);
038
039        /**
040         *      Get the ad slot which contain this ad. Only for renderer use.
041         *
042         *      @return an object of ISlot
043         */
044        public ISlot getSlot();
045
046        /**
047         *      Get the duration of the ad. It returns the most accurate value available to AdManager, which may come from the renderer or the ad response XML. 
048         *      The value reported by the renderer is considered more accurate than the value from ad response, aka. the creative duration value booked in MRM UI.
049         *
050         *      @return the duration of the ad, in seconds.
051         */
052        public double getDuration();
053
054        /**
055         *      Get the playhead time of the ad.
056         *
057         *      @return the playhead time of the ad, in seconds.
058         */
059        public double getPlayheadTime();
060
061
062        /**
063         *      Get active rendition of the ad instance. Only for renderer use.
064         *
065         *      @return an object of ICreativeRendition
066         */
067        public ICreativeRendition getActiveCreativeRendition();
068
069        /**
070         *      Get all renditions of this ad instance. Only for renderer use.
071         *
072         *      @return an ArrayList of type ICreativeRendition
073         */
074        public ArrayList<ICreativeRendition> getAllCreativeRenditions();
075
076        /**
077         * Get renderable renditions of this ad instance. Only for renderer use.
078         *
079         * @return an ArrayList of renderable ICreativeRendition
080         */
081        public ArrayList<ICreativeRendition> getRenderableCreativeRenditions();
082
083        /**
084         *      Set the active rendition of this ad, this rendition will finally be showed. Only for renderer use.
085         *
086         *      @param rendition the active rendition will be set
087         */
088        public void setActiveCreativeRendition(ICreativeRendition rendition);
089
090        /**
091         * Add a creative rendition to the ad instance. Only for renderer use.
092         *
093         * @return the ICreativeRendition object added to the ad instance
094         */
095        public ICreativeRendition createCreativeRenditionForTranslation();
096
097        /**
098         * Append additional tracking URLs to certain event specified by eventName and eventType. Only for renderer use.
099         *
100         * @param eventName name of the event
101         * @param eventType type of the event
102         * @param urls ArrayList of URLs to be added
103         * <br/>
104         * <br/>
105         * Available combination of input:<br/>
106         *              (EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       impression, aka ad display start<br/>
107         *              (EVENT_AD_CLICK,      EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       click tracking<br/>
108         *              ("a_custom_string",   EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       custom click tracking<br/>
109         *              (EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE,     EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       1st quartile<br/>
110         *              (EVENTCALLBACK_MIDPOINT,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       middle point<br/>
111         *              (EVENTCALLBACK_THIRDQUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       3rd quartile<br/>
112         *              (EVENTCALLBACK_COMPLETE,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       complete<br/>
113         *              (EVENT_AD_PAUSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, pause<br/>
114         *              (EVENT_AD_RESUME,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, resume<br/>
115         *              (EVENT_AD_REWIND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, rewind<br/>
116         *              (EVENT_AD_MUTE,               EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, mute<br/>
117         *              (EVENT_AD_UNMUTE,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, unmute<br/>
118         *              (EVENT_AD_COLLAPSE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, collapse<br/>
119         *              (EVENT_AD_EXPAND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, expand<br/>
120         *              (EVENT_AD_MINIMIZE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, minimize<br/>
121         *              (EVENT_AD_CLOSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, close<br/>
122         *              (EVENT_AD_ACCEPT_INVITATION,  EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, accept invitation<br/>
123         */
124        public void addEventCallbackURLs(String eventName, String eventType, final ArrayList<String> urls);
125
126        /**
127         * Set click through URL (replaces the CR value). Only for renderer use.
128         *
129         * @param url URL in String
130         * @param clickName name of the click in String, if clickName is null or empty, will set click through url to default click callback
131         */
132        public void setClickThroughURL(String url, String clickName);
133
134        /**
135         * Get the event callback URLs in an ArrayList. Only for renderer use.
136         *
137         * @param eventName name of the event
138         * @param eventType type of the event
139         * @return ArrayList of event callback URLs
140         * <br/>
141         * <br/>
142         * Available combination of input:<br/>
143         *              (EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       impression, aka ad display start<br/>
144         *              (EVENT_AD_CLICK,      EVENT_TYPE_CLICK)                 -       click through<br/>
145         *              (EVENT_AD_CLICK,      EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       click tracking<br/>
146         *              ("a_custom_string",   EVENT_TYPE_CLICK)                 -       custom click<br/>
147         *              ("a_custom_string",   EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING)        -       custom click tracking<br/>
148         *              (EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE,     EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       1st quartile<br/>
149         *              (EVENTCALLBACK_MIDPOINT,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       middle point<br/>
150         *              (EVENTCALLBACK_THIRDQUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       3rd quartile<br/>
151         *              (EVENTCALLBACK_COMPLETE,      EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION)    -       complete<br/>
152         *              (EVENT_AD_PAUSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, pause<br/>
153         *              (EVENT_AD_RESUME,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, resume<br/>
154         *              (EVENT_AD_REWIND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, rewind<br/>
155         *              (EVENT_AD_MUTE,               EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, mute<br/>
156         *              (EVENT_AD_UNMUTE,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, unmute<br/>
157         *              (EVENT_AD_COLLAPSE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, collapse<br/>
158         *              (EVENT_AD_EXPAND,             EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, expand<br/>
159         *              (EVENT_AD_MINIMIZE,           EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, minimize<br/>
160         *              (EVENT_AD_CLOSE,              EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, close<br/>
161         *              (EVENT_AD_ACCEPT_INVITATION,  EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD)              -       IAB metric, accept invitation<br/>
162         */
163        public ArrayList<String> getEventCallbackURLs(String eventName, String eventType);
164        
165        /**
166         *      Get the playable companion ad instances.
167         *      
168         *      @return an ArrayList of <IAdInstance> instances
169         */
170        public ArrayList<IAdInstance> getCompanionAdInstances();
171        
172        /**
173         *      Whether the ad is required to be shown by law, usually the ad is a companion ad.
174         *      
175         *      @return true if this ad is required to be shown, otherwise false
176         */
177        public boolean isRequiredToShow();
178}
